model

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Platform

    public abstract class Block
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class for block. All platforms and floors are blocks.
    Author:
    Alex Addeo, Zion Aranda, Katie Black, Michael Cisternino, Nick Hoffman
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block

        public Block(int x,
             int y,
             int initx,
             int inity,
             int width,
             int height,
             ObjectType t,
             RangeType r,
             java.lang.Boolean isVert,
             java.lang.Boolean isHor,
             GameController gc)
        Constructor for block.
        Parameters:
        x - The block's x position.
        y - The block's y position.
        initx - The block's initial x position.
        inity - The block's initial y position.
        width - The width of the block.
        height - The height of the block.
        t - The type of the object.
        r - The distance the block will move: none, short, medium, long.
        isVert - If the block will move vertically when it moves.
        isHor - If the block will move horizontally when it moves.
        gc - The game controller.
